timeline.bodyText: I would replace "maxLag" by something a bit more specific, to make sure there is no collision with anything else: for instance "wikibase:upload:maxLag".
timeline.author: wetneb

timeline.bodyText: What happens if parseInt fails?  Should it fall back to the default?
timeline.author: wetneb

replies.bodyText: good catch, I should wrap the code in a try catch and use default if user put something invalid.
replies.author: james-cui
